screenshots.caption: This is the JPojoTable demo in a Frame with sample pojo list

name: JPojoTable
short_description:
Advanced JTable framework
-new Swing component (JTable with tool bar)
Features:
-No Table Model to write!
-Inspects JPA beans/Pojos/Javabeans/Manual configuration
-Transactionnal saving
-Editable Properties Handler
-Provide enhanced Renderer/Cell Editors
